Subject: Your offer sounds good

Regards,
Cleveland Benson

Date: Saturday, 4/19/1987
Subject: Hector Pedraza failed learning new position
Hector Pedraza doesn't seem to make
any progress learning his new position, Catcher.
I would give up this experiment before his hitting suffers.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1987
Subject: Progress of Robert Snelling
Dear Sir,
Robert Snelling has an ERA of 1.77 at A Somer's Point Tug Boats!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1987
Subject: Status of Augustine Marzano
Dear Sir,
Augustine Marzano shouldn't play at AA Margate Bridges!
He has an AVG of .220 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director
